translations.translation: when the Pages are opened up,
When the ledgers are laid open,
and when the scrolls of (men's) deeds shall be unfolded,
the records of deeds are made public,
And when the Records of Account are laid bare.
And when the pages are laid open.
And when the books are spread,
when the scrolls shall be unrolled,
And when the pages are laid open,
when the records of men's deeds are laid open,
And when the Writs shall be lain open,
When the records [of deeds] are unfolded,
When the scrolls are laid open;
And when the written pages of deeds (good and bad) of every person shall be laid open;
When the records are made public.
And when the pages are made public
[81:10] and when the scrolls, the scrolls containing the deeds, are unrolled (read nushirat or nushshirat), [when they are] unfolded and spread out;
(And when the pages) the registers of good and bad deeds (are laid open) for reckoning; it is also said this means: when they fly about in people's hands,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَإِذَا ٱلصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ } أعطى كُلَّ إنسانٍ كتابَهُ بيمينهِ أو شمالهِ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَإِذَا ٱلصُّحُفُ } أي: صحائف تفاصيل الأعمال المشتملة على عموم الأماني والآمال، المطلوبة فيها جميع الأحوال الصادرة من أصحاب الغفلة والضلال { نُشِرَتْ } [التكوير: 10] فرِّقت وكشفت بين أصحابها
